description:
High-end features, full suspension and seating for 1 or 2 kids. This bike trailer easily converts to a stroller and provides a comfortable ride on trails or rough ground. It uses adjustable suspension, a padded 5-point harnesses and reclining hammock style seats to make the ride comfy. The Encore X comes with seat pads, tinted side and rear windows with UV protection, and a sunshade for bright days. It's compatible with conversion kits to turn it into a stroller, jogger or ski sled to explore the road – running path or ski track – less travelled.

  • Included 1-Wheel Stroller Kit enhances use with a quick transition from biking to strolling out of the box
  • Suspension keeps kids comfortable by softening bumps and washboard gravel
  • 20-inch push button wheels are quick and easy to install and remove
  • Height adjustable handlebar doubles as an additional roll bar when in trailer mode, handlebar height: 76.2-116.8 cm
  • Water-resistant cover helps little ones safe from the elements
  • Rear window ventilation
  • Sunshade protects passengers from harmful UV rays
  • Flex connector lets you lie the bike down, while the trailer remains upright
  • Seat release buckles collapse the seat for easy conversion from carrying kids to hauling 60L of cargo
  • Hub-engaged parking brake keeps the trailer in place when loading and unloading
  • 5-point harness system
  • Full internal aluminum roll cage for protection in an accident
  • Folds for storage and transport, folded dimensions: 91.4 x 78.7 x 30.5cm
  • Open dimensions: 84.6 x 78.7 x 94cm
  • Interior seated height: 60.9 cm
  • Interior seat width is 57.1cm, shoulder width is 55.6cm
  • Seated leg room: 54.6cm
  • Various adapters available separately to use for walking, running or skiing
  • Includes: trailer, user’s manual, tow bar with hitch, 2 wheels, 2 wheel guards, and safety flag
name: Burley Encore X Child Trailer - Infants to Children
